dai::TreeEP

dai::TreeEP Class Reference

#include <dai/treeep.h>

Inheritance diagram for dai::TreeEP:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Approximate inference algorithm "TreeEP" by Minka and Qi.

Member Function Documentation

void dai::TreeEP::init (  )  [virtual]

Initializes all data structures of the approximate inference algorithm.

This method should be called at least once before run() is called

Reimplemented from dai::JTree.

virtual void dai::TreeEP::init ( const VarSet &  ns  )  [inline, virtual]

Initializes all data structures corresponding to some set of variables.

This method can be used to do a partial initialization after a part of the factor graph has changed. Instead of initializing all data structures, it only initializes those involving the variables in ns.

Reimplemented from dai::JTree.

virtual double dai::TreeEP::maxDiff (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return maximum difference between single node beliefs in the last pass

Exceptions:
Exception if not implemented/supported

Reimplemented from dai::JTree.

virtual size_t dai::TreeEP::Iterations (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return number of passes over the factorgraph

Exceptions:
Exception if not implemented/supported

Reimplemented from dai::JTree.

std::pair< size_t, size_t > treewidth ( const FactorGraph &  fg  )  [related, inherited]

Calculates upper bound to the treewidth of a FactorGraph.

Returns:
a pair (number of variables in largest clique, number of states in largest clique)
